entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
